**About Us**

Welcome to Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC, your trusted partner for all your plumbing needs in Harpersville, AL. With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, we provide top-notch plumbing services that ensure your home or business runs smoothly. Our team of expert plumbers is equipped with the latest technology and years of experience to handle any plumbing issue, from routine maintenance to emergency repairs.

At Salser Plumbing, we pride ourselves on our prompt and reliable service. Whether you need help with clogged drains, broken water heaters, or any other plumbing concern, our dedicated professionals are available 24/7 to get the job done right the first time. We believe in transparency and honesty, which is why we offer free estimates and competitive pricing.

Our goal is to provide you with peace of mind, knowing that your plumbing system is in good hands. Trust Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC to keep your home or business running efficiently and safely. Contact us today to schedule your service and experience the difference that comes with choosing a reputable and reliable plumbing company.
